ygData.subject: Re: I have a question about a quest!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... South ... the PVP ... elevated ... left. ... with the ... Qeynos Guards ... Lieutenant ... LOT of ... I ve done this quest so many times my faction is
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Thomas H. Comegys" <tcomegys@s...> wrote:
> Captain Tillin is in the Grounds of Fate (Warrior guild/Arena) in
South
> Qeynos. You enter the Grounds of Fate, turn right before entering
the PVP
> area and go up the ramp. At the top turn left and follow the
elevated
> walkway to the building at the other end. Go inside and turn to the
left.
> Captain Tillin is standing outside on the balcony.
>
> Be aware that turning in gnoll fangs to him lowers your faction
with the
> Corrupt Qeynos Guards. My level 41 druid is KOS to the Corrupt
Qeynos Guards
> now. Every time he has entered North Qeynos, even in wolf form,
Lieutenant
> Dagarok has killed him. I will say that you would have to turn in a
LOT of
> gnoll fangs though.
>
> Froondor
>

I've done this quest so many times my faction is apprehensive with
the corrupt guards and couldn't get any better with the good guys.
Same with the Fayguard, some Dwarves and the Paladins in Freeport.

It is best to know who you're messing with. I've found that killing
Bandits and Raiders in NK helps with the bad guard faction. I have a
friend who is running a Half-elf Rogue and he keeps close track of
his faction. He can go anywhere!

And back on topic, give him the teeth 4 at a time, and make sure you
have slots open. And you do know about that second part of the quest?

Tuldayen Grimblade
36th Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
